text: Do you have any .htaccess File in place to avoid people coming to http pages?

Reminder: HubSpot has an <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/view-seo-recommendations-in-HubSpot|SEO recommendations tool> built into HubSpot that helps you track down issues and suggests changes you can make.

Hi. Question about redirects and indexing. For some reason, HubSpot won’t allow me to create redirects for 404 files and so I’m unable to fix those 404 errors. Should I just `no index nofollow` the broken 404s and fix them in the file manager to avoid new 404s in the next crawl?
